long_description: Designed to work with the high seat backs of many kayaks, the Astral Ronny Fisher PFD features 2 flip-open pockets that create a platform for attaching lures and a stowaway hood for sudden squalls. Durable polyethylene foam delivers high flotation with weight savings. Nylon outer shell provides superior abrasion resistance and durability; mesh liner enhances breathability. Quick-access lash tab offers quick access to a paddling knife or safety radio (not included). Dial in the fit of the Astral Ronny Fisher PFD using the adjustable webbing side straps and adjustable shoulder straps. Reflective highlights increase visibility in low light; convertible beverage pocket; tool organizer with multiple attachment points.
short_description: Designed to work with the high seat backs of many kayaks, the Astral Ronny Fisher PFD features 2 flip-open pockets that create a platform for attaching lures and a stowaway hood for sudden squalls.
